title: Jimmy Neutron: boy genius
creator_credit: Paramount Pictures, Nickelodeon Movies, O Entertainment, Steve Oedekerk, John A. Davis and Albie Hecht
brief_description: Computer animated sci-fi story about boy genius Jimmy Neutron who unwittingly causes havoc when a satellite launched by him is picked up by an alien species known as Yokians. These strange green aliens invade Jimmy’s hometown Retroville in the dark of night and abduct all the parents in the town leaving it up to Jimmy, along with his robotic dog, Goddard, his best friend Carl Wheezer and his arch rival Cindy Vortex to take to the skies in a rescue bid to save the parents from becoming human sacrifices. Features the voices of Debi Derryberry, Megan Cavanagh, Mark Decarlo, Martin Short and Patrick Stewart.
